SEARCH
Package test

Class TestInitialSetup

java.lang.Object
test.Test
test.TestInitialSetup
public class TestInitialSetup extends Test
Tests the initial setup of the blockchain network to ensure that all nodes correctly mine the genesis block. This class verifies that each node in the network starts with a correct blockchain initialization, which includes mining and validating the genesis block upon startup.

It configures a small network of nodes and starts them with a specified mining difficulty. After initialization, it checks each node to ensure that the genesis block is present and correctly formed, indicating a successful startup and synchronization across the network.

  • Method Details

    • perform

      public void perform() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Executes the initial setup test. Starts the miner nodes and verifies that each node has mined and possesses only the genesis block.
      Specified by:
      perform in class Test
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an I/O error during node communication.
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted during its execution.
